title: BRIEF-Pareteum Awarded $5 Million Contract From India-Based Telecom Company
text:
May 9, 2018 / 12:51 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Pareteum Awarded $5 Million Contract From India-Based Telecom Company Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Pareteum Corp:
* PARETEUM AWARDED $5 MILLION CONTRACT FROM INDIA-BASED TELECOM COMPANY
* PARETEUM CORP - HAS BEEN AWARDED A 3-YEAR CONTRACT WITH AN INDIA-BASED TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMPANY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
